notes: Kills weaker creatures. It's dangerous to follow him when he runs in low health because he can lure you into a bigger spawn of [[Isle of Evil#Monsters|Isle of Evil monsters]].
sounds: ISHH THAT THE BESHHT YOU HAVE TO OFFERRR, TIBIANSHH?
MY SHHEED IS FEARRR AND MY HARRRVEST ISHH YOURRR SHHOUL!
name: Demon Parrot
strategy: Try to stay at a distance and to stand diagonal of it to evade his beam.
